tweet: My daughter and four of her teammates made the ODP 1998 Soccer Team!  They are planning further cuts, but for now that is great news!
My daughter's soccer team tied for first place in their division.  Had a nice wrap-up party at the coaches house.  Looking forward to futsal
Tomorrow my daughter's soccer team plays for the division championship.  Hopefully they will come out on top!
Tonight BYU Womens soccer team plays TCU.  My daughter gets to play in a demonstration game during half time -- exciting game!
BYU womens soccer team won game against New Mexico tonight 3-0.  The Cougs are ranked 9th in nation! My daughter was ball girl at the game!
